__e: People must not stop, The stupid questions.
Go away with your foolish questions, which don't have no brain.
All right... ask your dumb questions. Go ahead, while you two still have a job.
All the stupid little things I let bother me.
Listen to me, not some silly little girl.
We don't have time to care about humans and their silly little lives.
It's these stupid things they say because of my eyes...
It's good of them to look after us here, so we don't do bad things
Just wanna say I'm sorry for something, one of those stupid things kids do, they don't know they're doing.
It is only very, very stupid people who think the law is stupid.
Done by stupid people who had no idea who my family was!
But I can't just sit around waiting for someone I love to die because of my stupid mistake.
She says that everyone will see how amazing I am and then all of the silly mistakes, they won't matter anymore.
I just want people to see me for once, not my stupid mistakes.
